job.title: Test Engineer
job.description: <p>Responsibilities<br>1. Perform Agricultural Vehicle Display System Functional Testing and software validation for display on different Agricultural vehicles like tractor, combine and various harvester vehicles.<br>2. Perform Manual bench testing using tools like CANalyzer / CANoE devices, or other tools for serial bus system data logging and analysis. <br>3. Perform Testing on physical vehicle on need basis.<br>4. Understanding the system improvements , requirements, create test plan, review with stakeholders and execute<br>5. Perform Integration testing support<br>6. Validate the sprint release software on actual display hardware<br>7. Maintain the test bench and test environment<br>8. Collaborate with cross-functional teams like system engineering , product Validation and internal test teams at offshore location<br>9. Participate on system requirement and Test reviews <br>10. Follow the client project execution process (Agile SCRUM)<br>11. Work closely with different validation groups to understand the defect / issue generated.<br><br></p><p>Qualifications<br>* Bachelor's Degree in Agricultural, Electrical Engineering, computer science or EET or related degree area.<br><br></p><p>Preferred Qualifications<br><br></p><p>* Previous testing experience for Automotive, Off-highway vehicles <br>* Any experience with Polarion tool<br>* Knowledge of vehicle communication and Diagnostics protocols: CAN/LIN/J1939/XCP/UDS<br>* Experience with Farm Equipment, Precision Farming systems or connected vehicle systems.<br>* Experience in electronic troubleshooting and diagnostics or a related field. Complex mechanical assembly service or troubleshooting acceptable too. <br>* Experience with development and execution of test plans.<br>* Ability to demonstrate good written and verbal communication skills required.<br>* Ability to demonstrate good computer skills with Word, Excel, MSOffice suite.<br>* Ability to work independently with little supervision.<br>* Communications protocol experience and understanding (e.g. Serial, Cellular, Wifi, GPS, ISOBUS).<br>* Agricultural, construction, or similar background which demonstrates familiarity with operation of off-highway equipment.<br> <br><br></p><p>IND123<br><br></p>
